FAILURE: Operation failed. Please try again later
ACCEPTED: Your request has been accepted and is being processed
NO_CONTENT: Operation completed with no content to return
BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again
UNAUTHORIZED: Authentication required. Please log in to continue
FORBIDDEN: You don't have permission to access this resource
NOT_FOUND: {{resource}} not found or has been removed
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: The request method is not allowed for this resource
CONFLICT: Request conflicts with existing data in the system
GONE: Resource is no longer available and has been permanently removed
REQUEST_TIMEOUT: Request timed out. Please try again
UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA_TYPE: File format is not supported. Please use a different format
UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: Unable to process request due to semantic errors
TOO_EARLY: Request cannot be processed at this time. Please try again later
PRECONDITION_REQUIRED: Request requires additional preconditions to proceed
VALIDATION_ERROR: Validation failed. Please check your input
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You've sent too many requests. Please try again in {{time}} seconds
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: An internal server error has occurred. We're working to fix this issue
NOT_IMPLEMENTED: This feature is not yet implemented. Please try again later
BAD_GATEWAY: Server received an invalid response. Please try again later
SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Service is currently unavailable due to maintenance or overload
GATEWAY_TIMEOUT: Server didn't receive a timely response. Please try again later
INSUFFICIENT_STORAGE: Not enough storage space to complete the request
